title: The Virgin Sacrifice
description: The wedding is off, and all I want to do is get drunk with my friends… Until three beautiful monsters crash the party.I’ve always had this little gift. I can tell when something bad is about to happen. I have excellent foresight with other people—but less so in my own personal life. I didn’t know that my fiancé was cheating on me, for example. I didn’t find that out until the night of my bachelorette party.Now I’m trapped in this neo-goth nightclub, hunting for a revenge f*ck, when three beautiful monsters walk into the bar… and I’m not joking. They’re here for me. I’m supposed to come with them. And they didn’t get the memo about that revenge f*ck.I’m supposed to be the key, their Oracle says. I’m supposed to save Everdark from a “war of the dead.” And all I have to do is sacrifice my heart.SLOW BURN | REVERSE HAREM | PARANORMAL FANTASYIf you’re looking for a fast-paced, steamy read in a dark and twisted universe, try me out... Bon appétit!
author: Sera James
